data.title: Michael Saylor's Bitcoin Hype Machine Is Glitching Out
data.description: Here’s how Michael Saylor’s Bitcoin treasury company Strategy Inc. is supposed to work: The firm raises funds to buy Bitcoin; that buying drives up the price of Bitcoin; the share price of Strategy follows suit. Rinse and repeat. The trade, helped along by the utter self-belief of Saylor as a hype capitalist on par with OpenAI Inc.’s Sam Altman, has been so lucrative it has spawned dozens of imitators hoping to capture the same “infinite money glitch,” like a cheat code on a video game.
